item.title: ‘Saturday Night Live’: Every One-Season Wonder, From Martin Short to Robert Downey Jr.
item.description: One alum has won an Oscar. Another has a Grammy. Several have acquired Emmys and Tonys — and they all have been featured players in only a single season of Lorne Michaels’ long-running sketch comedy s
